author: ate
msg: Fix for login error count reporting, now also working on Tomcat 5.

author: rogerrut
msg: The current version of SSO relies on the Jetspeed security model (storage of credentials/Principals) but for future release it can be decoupled from Jetspeed.
Portlets (IFrame, perl, PHP) will be enhanced (Preference setting) so that they can enable SSO functionality.

author: rogerrut
